description: Provides an application cookie stickiness policy, which allows an ELB to wed its sticky cookie's expiration to a cookie generated by your application.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

CookieName.description: The application cookie whose lifetime the ELB's cookie should follow.

LbPort.description:
The load balancer port to which the policy
should be applied. This must be an active listener on the load
balancer.

LoadBalancer.description:
The name of load balancer to which the policy
should be attached.

Name.description: The name of the stickiness policy.
